page.title: 16ST.EDMUNDS CHURCH - HARGRAVE
page.content: The Rector Rev. C. Kevill-Davies is shared with three other parishes. The first Sunday in the month a Family Service is shared with the Methodist Chapel in the village. The congretation is mostly elderly folk, the services in recent years being held in the Chancel as the everage attendance is 10. When I came to Hargrave someone, who had lived there for 17 years asked if the Church was used. It is difficult to face the future with any degree of optimism when a stewardship campaign some years ago proved very disappointing the only people who gave were those who already supported the Church BUT a small minority of churchgoers seem gripped by dogged determination to continue the tradition of whorship in their church faithful to the tremendous burden placed on them by care of such a large building, quite outgrown its purpose.
